title: Meghann Fahy
summary: Meghann Fahy (born 1989/1990) is an American actress. Her first prominent role was playing Hannah O'Connor on the ABC daytime soap opera One Life to Live from 2010 to 2012. She starred as Sutton Brady on the Freeform drama series The Bold Type, which ran from 2017 to 2021. In 2022, Fahy played Daphne on the second season of the HBO series The White Lotus. On Broadway, she starred as Natalie Goodman in the stage musical Next to Normal from 2010 to 2011.
